resources.string: Family-friendly Plex streaming with advanced content filtering

PureStream is a family-friendly Android TV streaming app that connects to your Plex media servers with advanced profanity filtering capabilities. Perfect for families who want to enjoy their media collection while maintaining appropriate content standards.

Key Features:
• Connect to multiple Plex servers
• Advanced 4-level profanity filtering (None, Mild, Moderate, Strict)
• Real-time subtitle analysis and filtering
• Custom word filtering and whitelisting
• Multiple user profiles with individual filter settings
• Child and adult profile types
• Seamless Android TV experience with D-pad navigation
• High-quality video playback with subtitle support
• Animal-themed profile avatars
• Audio muting during filtered content

PureStream gives parents peace of mind while allowing the whole family to enjoy their favorite movies and TV shows together.
PureStream is designed as a family-friendly application that helps filter inappropriate content from media streams. The app itself contains no offensive material.
